title: Tears
text:
Tears
Tears fall down my face
crawling in every dent
every crack
dripping down on my clothes
in a single spot
it gets darker and darker
dark as my mind
thoughts so dark
thoughts so sad
Memories so full of joy
when everything was bright
all before the time
when everything went dark
before I lost my soul
lost my mind
lost my own
Now I cant sleep
I have lost it all
everything that used to be mine
everything I had gained
everything I loved
all lost
I cry

replies.text:

vááa´!!
gleðilegt nýtt ár,
estoy
Já þetta er eftir mig, eins og allt sem ég hef sent hingað
